title: Run pre-flight checks
description:
Verify the codebase is in a healthy state before starting implementation.

Commands to run:
- go build ./...
- go test ./internal/worktree/...

Note: There are 2 pre-existing test failures in tickboard/cloud and tickboard/server packages. These are unrelated to this feature and should be ignored.
acceptance_criteria: go build ./... succeeds; go test ./internal/worktree/... passes
closed_reason: Build succeeds and all worktree tests pass. Fixed unused encoding/json import in worktree.go.
